"SAVE THE LIFE OF MY CHILD",2005,5
Magneto and Professor X face some tough choices with their charge on Genosha, while Callisto and Archangel face a deadly and familiar adversary-Viper!
Part 2 (of 4).
32 PGS. (each)/Marvel PSR ...$2.99
